txt.en: 'Thank you again for your assistance with my pack. I was foolish to think Kizeri would cut me loose for such a simple transgression. I know I said I have nothing to offer your kindness, but I remembered I have some fine tobacco from Umbar I can share. We can sit and share. If you wish, we can sit and talk for a while.'
You learned much about the young man you helped. You should say your farewell in the shadow of Telperiën's Wall.
Raphûz, grateful for your assistance in recovering his pack, asks you to join him for tea and a smoke by the fireside.
'Join me? We can share the fire, my tabacco, and I will prepare some tea.'
'Thank you for listening and sharing my tobacco. I am unsure what my future holds. I am glad we spoke. You have a good ear for conversation.'
'Join me? We can share the fire, my tobacco, and I will prepare some tea.'
Complete the Instance: A Promise Kept
Raphûz asked you to join him for tea and a smoke at the Tale-warden encampment near Telperiën's Wall.
